name: Project G (itch) (Beetlejukes)
description:
Project G Prototyping To Completion

First weekly build for a neat learning project

Project Abstract:

A fun endless runner in which the player can reverse the force of gravity by jumping in midair

Current Features:
  • Randomly instantiated platforms
  • Player can reverse gravity with a second midair jump
  • Score meter to keep track of performance
  • Simple camera system
  • Gradual speed increase to ramp difficulty
Planned Features:
  • Randomly instantiated background scenery
  • Minimalist soundtrack
  • Personal scoreboards for progress tracking
Controls:
  • Spacebar to jump/reverse gravity
  • 'R' to restart
